title: Christmas every day
brief_description: Based on a story by William Dean Howells, this animated version is about a little girl called Matilda who wishes that every day be Christmas. When her wish is granted by the Christmas fairy, it doesn’t take her, her family, or the whole town long to realise that Christmas is better coming once a year only.
